Package net.sf.cotelab.playingcards.javafx

Class CardViewFactory

java.lang.Object
net.sf.cotelab.playingcards.javafx.CardViewFactory
public class CardViewFactory extends Object
A factory for CardView objects. A view can only have one parent at a time, so views, per se, are not cached.

This class uses an instance of ImageFactory, to provide caching and image scaling.

  • Constructor Details

    • CardViewFactory

      public CardViewFactory()
      Construct a new object, using default values.

    • CardViewFactory

      public CardViewFactory(double maxDim)
      Construct a new object, specifying the image bounding box dimension. Each image is scaled to fit in a square bounding box. The aspect ratio is preserved, so the effect is that the image's maximum dimension is given by maxDim.
      Parameters:
      maxDim - the image bounding box dimension.

  • Method Details

    • getBackView

      public CardView getBackView(Card card)
      Get the back view of a card. All of the cards share a back image, but the view is of a specific card.
      Parameters:
      card - the card.
      Returns:
      the back view of the card.
